questions.question: The Sir Garfield Sobers Trophy is awarded to the ICC Cricketer of the Year.
The ICC Awards ceremony is held every two years.
The Rachael Heyhoe Flint Trophy is awarded to the ICC Women's Cricketer of the Year.
The ICC Spirit of Cricket Award recognizes fair play and sportsmanship.
The David Shepherd Trophy is awarded to the ICC Umpire of the Year.
Players can win the same ICC award multiple times in their career.
The ICC Awards include separate categories for Test, ODI, and T20I performances.
The ICC Emerging Player of the Year award is only for players under 21 years of age.
The ICC Awards were first introduced in 2004.
Associate and Affiliate member players are eligible for all ICC Awards categories.
